name: Chroma Chroma
description:
A game about mixing colors and getting new weapon combinations to destroy the enemy horde that wants to steal the color from the world. Have Bullet Hell & small RPG elements.

Made for Mix & Game Jam in 48h!

KEYBOARD:

Arrows - Move;
X - Change Left Color;
C - Change Right Color;
Z - Shoot;
ENTER - Pause;

XBOX CONTROLLER:

Left Joystick - Move;
LB - Change Left Color;
RB - Change Right Color;
X - Shoot;
Start - Pause;

*Game Jam Version always included*
